Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Library
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Library due to sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Library due to sick passenger. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the  #22 Clark, or #81Lawrence Buses or  nearby rail line.
